entry.summary: Learning CUDA I completed the rest of the OLCF CUDA Training Series. Meetings and Summer School The OLCF User Meeting was this week and the Rensselaer Summer Program: Advanced Cyberinfrastructure Training for Modeling Physical Systems summer school started. This week was the bootcamp that just went over some basic computational skills.
